text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Hello Sir
🇧🇩
We are donating food and grocery for the ongoing Ramadan to the Underprivileged Peoples effect by the #COVID19 Virus #lockdown.
If anyone wants to be a part of this contribution, please kindly let us know.
